page.title: 13ANNUAL VILLAGE FETE
page.content: The annual village fete is now held on Rectory Field - part of Fitzjohns Farm on the 1st Saturday in July. Originally organised by the Church Council to raise funds for Church restoration, it is now jointly run by the Great Canfield Society and the Church Council. The Fete consists of side shows, competitive stalls, competitions such as bowling for a turkey, tossing the hay bale and children's races. Afternoon teas and ices are served. The fete is often followed by a village barbecue in the evening. The event usually raises about Â£400.
